plugins.name: Swap remote to local instances and variables - Lazy Swap
plugins.description:
1. Swap remote instances to local instances.
  2. Select pages containing components for quick scanning.
  3. Select the necessary local components for quick swapping.
  4. Double-check to ensure all corresponding remote instances are fully converted to local instances.
  5. Swap remote variables to local variables.
  6. Select the types you want to swap.
  7. Double-check to ensure all corresponding remote variables are fully converted to local variables.

Easy and fast conversion. Free for you.
plugins.tagline: Swap remote instances to local instances and remote variables to local variables, easy and fast.

129143.name: Swap remote to local instances and variables - Lazy Swap

  5. Swap remote variables to local variables.
  6. Select the types you want to swap.
  7. Double-check to ensure all corresponding remote variables are fully converted to local variables.

Easy and fast conversion. Free for you.
129143.tagline: Swap remote instances to local instances and remote variables to local variables, easy and fast.

plugins.name: print my type
plugins.description:
PMT instantly visualizes all local text styles in your design file, grouping them by name for easy organization.


Each style appears on a dedicated frame with key details—font size, style, name, and line height—giving designers a clear, organized snapshot of their typography.


Perfect for managing and fine-tuning project styles at a glance, documentation and smooth design to dev handovers!

plugins.name: FigTextExporter
plugins.description:
# FigText Exporter: AI-Powered Translation Export Plugin for Figma


Transform your Figma text layers into translation-ready JSON files instantly with FigText - the smart localization assistant for designers and developers.


## Key Features


- *Automatic Text Detection:* Scans your Figma files and identifies all text layers that need translation

- *Smart JSON Generation:* Creates structured JSON translation files with nested keys based on your design hierarchy

- *Multi-Language Support:* Export translation files for multiple languages simultaneously

- *Context Preservation:* Maintains the original context of text elements for more accurate translations


## Benefits


- *Time Savings:* Convert hours of manual work into seconds of automated processing

- *Improved Workflow:* Seamlessly integrate with your development pipeline

- *Error Prevention:* Reduce human error in translation file creation

- *Team Efficiency:* Perfect for small teams looking to streamline their localization process


🚀 Stop spending valuable time on manual translation file creation. Let FigText handle the tedious work while you focus on what matters most - creating amazing designs.


## How It Works


1. Select your text layers in Figma

2. Run FigText plugin

3. Choose your target languages

4. Get your translation-ready JSON files instantly


Perfect for developers and designers who want to maintain productivity without getting bogged down by repetitive localization tasks.
plugins.tagline: Easily export and translate text from figma projects

plugins.name: RAD's Icon
plugins.description:
The 200+ icons in the RAD's Icon plugin are designed to enhance any user interface design across various industries. Perfect for both personal and commercial projects, these icons are easy to find and customize directly within Figma.


Popular icon categories in RAD's Icon:

  1. Finance and payments
  2. E-commerce and shopping
  3. Health and wellness
  4. Education
  5. Security and access control
  6. Media & Entertainment
  7. Enterprise Software (B2B)
  8. Travel & hospitality


Plugin features:

  1. Drag and drop icons into your design
  2. Search by tags for instant access to the right icons
  3. Customize icon size and color to match your style


Coming soon:

  1. Additional icons across new categories
  2. Save and manage favorite icons
  3. Advanced search filters and suggestions
plugins.tagline: Customizable Icons for Every Industry

plugins.name: BizTag - Name Tag Generator
plugins.description:
Automating the name tag design process


Conferences, case comps, and hackathons make up the highlights of many student's time in universities. Why? Because they combine hands-on learning, creativity, teamwork, networking, and the thrill of solving real-world challenges in a lively, collaborative environment.


If you've ever attended one of these events, you might notice that professional partners have name tags around their neck. Designing these name tags can take hours of manual work to make the layouts consistent and audit for content mistakes. But what if all that work could be done with the click of a button?


Meet BizTag


BizTag is a powerful Figma plugin that is built by a designer, for designers. The app communicates with Figma's Plugin API to build a series of clean, customizable, and organized name tags.


All it takes is a background image with a resolution of your choosing, and a .csv file populated with information on your event partners, and you can generate dozens of name tags instantly. The plugin automatically places name, company, and pronouns on the frontside, and generates a QR code to place on the backside using a QR code API.


Each frame comes with auto layout, enabling ease of customizability for the designer.


Schema


The schema is as follows:


type Partner = {
firstname: string;
lastname: string;
position: string; // Position @ Company
pronouns: string; // etc. They / Them
linkedin: string; // LinkedIn Profile URL
};

type PartnerList = Partner[];


where the .json / .csv file is taken as a single PartnerList object.
plugins.tagline: Automate your graphic design process

manifest.name: BizTag - Autogenerate Name Tags for Event Partners

plugins.name: FontLang Switcher
plugins.description:
Transform your Figma designs with ease! This plugin combines three essential features into one convenient tool:


🌐 Translate Text – Instantly translate your design’s text content into various languages. Ideal for multilingual design projects.


🔤 Replace Fonts – Quickly swap fonts across your designs, making global typography updates a breeze.


🔄 Mirror Elements – Flip or mirror design elements horizontally for right-to-left (RTL) support or layout variations.


Why you’ll love this plugin:

✅ Save time on manual updates

✅ Enhance global design workflows

✅ Streamline font management and layout adjustments

Perfect for designers working on international products, multilingual interfaces, and adaptable layouts.
plugins.tagline: Seamless Text Translation, Font Replacement & Mirroring – All in One Plugin

136554.name: FontLang Switcher
136554.description:

plugins.name: Ten Tone - Color Generator
plugins.description:
Ten Toneは、あなたのカラーワークフローを劇的に効率化するFigmaプラグインです。


・10段階カラースケール生成

任意のベースカラーから、Mantine風の美しい10段階のカラースケールを瞬時に作成。明るい色から暗い色までバランス良く調整され、デザインの一貫性を保ちます。複数のベースカラーを指定して、一度にまとめて生成することも可能です。


・色相バリエーション生成

ベースカラーの彩度と明度を維持したまま、赤・青・緑など様々な色相のバリエーションを簡単に探求できます。アクセントカラーやテーマカラーの検討に最適です。


UIデザイン、グラフィックデザイン、資料作成など、あらゆる場面でのカラーパレット選定と配色作業を、より直感的かつスピーディーに。

Ten Toneで、色の可能性を最大限に引き出しましょう。」
plugins.tagline: カラーシステム構築を加速。スケール＆色相バリエーション生成。

plugins.name: logoplacer
plugins.description:
Logo Placer simplifies the process of adding multiple logos to your designs while maintaining clean spacing and visual consistency. Perfect for partner sections, client showcases, sponsor walls, and more.


Features:

Upload up to 4 logos with automatic placement

Smart resizing that maintains logo aspect ratios

Multi-frame support – Select multiple frames and place logos simultaneously

Dynamic scaling based on frame size

Equal spacing between logos, every time

Reset button to quickly start over

Clean and intuitive interface


Ideal For:

Creating partner/client sections

Designing sponsor walls

Showcasing collaborations

Building marketing materials

Presenting design portfolios


How to Use:

  1. Select one or more frames in your design
  2. Open the Logo Placer plugin
  3. Upload up to 4 logos
  4. Watch as they're automatically resized, placed, and spaced
  5. Hit reset to start fresh anytime


Why Use Logo Placer?

When you have a lot of design assets and deadlines, placing logos manually can be tedious and error-prone. You often deal with:


  1. Inconsistent sizing
  2. Uneven spacing
  3. Manual alignment headaches

Logo Placer removes that friction by automating placement and ensuring a professional layout every time—no grids, nudging, or guesswork needed.
plugins.tagline: "Automatically arrange and space multiple logos in your designs"

🐛 Bug Fixes – Squashed several bugs for a smoother experience.
🔧 Multi-Frame Selection – You can now select and work with multiple frames at once!
134071.tagline: "Automatically arrange and space multiple logos in your designs"

plugins.name: FIGMAJSON
plugins.description:
To use:

  1. Match your layer names exactly to your keys inside of your JSON file.
  2. Select the outermost frame/group of the text layers.
  3. Upload your JSON file.
  4. Select all of the keys you want to populate your component with.
  5. Hit apply!


If you run into any issues, email tyler@tylerwest.co.


Example JSON file structure:

[
  {
    "name": "Salvador Dalí",
    "birth_year": 1904,
    "death_year": 1989,
    "nationality": "Spanish",
    "famous_work": "The Persistence of Memory",
    "style": "Surrealism"
  },
  {
    "name": "René Magritte",
    "birth_year": 1898,
    "death_year": 1967,
    "nationality": "Belgian",
    "famous_work": "The Son of Man",
    "style": "Surrealism"
  },
  {
    "name": "Joan Miró",
    "birth_year": 1893,
    "death_year": 1983,
    "nationality": "Spanish",
    "famous_work": "The Birth of the World",
    "style": "Surrealism"
  },
  {
    "name": "Max Ernst",
    "birth_year": 1891,
    "death_year": 1976,
    "nationality": "German",
    "famous_work": "The Elephant Celebes",
    "style": "Surrealism"
  },
  {
    "name": "André Breton",
    "birth_year": 1896,
    "death_year": 1966,
    "nationality": "French",
    "famous_work": "Manifesto of Surrealism",
    "style": "Surrealism"
  }
]
plugins.tagline: Easily populate Figma content with JSON data.

89414.name: FIGMAJSON
89414.description:

  1. Match your layer names exactly to your keys inside of your JSON file.
  2. Select the outermost frame/group of the text layers.
  3. Upload your JSON file.
  4. Select all of the keys you want to populate your component with.
  5. Hit apply!


If you run into any issues, email tyler@tylerwest.co.

plugins.name: m16n
plugins.description:
{
    "general": {
        "sample" :[
            "The text layer named 'general.sample' will be changed this string when '0' is selected.",
            "'1' を選択すると、'general.sample' という名称のテキスト要素がこのテキストに書き換わります。"
        ],
        "back": [
            "back",
            "戻る"
        ]
    },
    "stage_1": {
        "S_information": {
            "title": [
                "Information",
                "お知らせ"
            ]
        },
        "S_login": {
            "title": [
                "Sign in ",
                "ログイン"
            ]
        }
    }
}


How to use


  1. Specify text layer name according to the JSON hierarchy structure. (e.g. ) general.back or stage1.S_information.title
  2. Select the element you want to change.
  3. Launch plugin.
  4. Upload json file from button.
  5. If you select Language index "0",
  6. and press "Update word",
  7. then, for example, the value of text layer named "general.back" will be replaced to "back".


  • If the Target node is "Only selected Nodes", only selected elements are replaced. If "All", all elements are replaced. (The "All" option may not be able to process pages of enormous size.)
  • The language designation is an array number, so any numbers of languages can be added.
plugins.tagline: Manage multiple languages in a single json file.

plugins.name: tailwindcss inspector
plugins.description:
This plugin generates class names based on your tailwind.config.js file. For example:


If you've defined "brand": "var(--emphasis-brand)" in theme.extend.colors, when a button's background color uses the --emphasis-brand variable, the plugin will automatically generate the bg-brand class for you.
plugins.tagline: Generate tailwindcss code based on your config file

plugins.name: Centra Colors
plugins.description:
Centra Colors is an intelligent color system companion for Figma that brings precision, clarity, and creativity to color selection. Powered by the perceptually uniform OKLCH color space and wrapped in an intuitive interface, it helps you create accessible, harmonious palettes that elevate your design system and streamline your workflow.


Create with Confidence

Make color decisions faster with smart tools designed for both aesthetic nuance and accessibility. Every palette you generate comes with semantic color naming and WCAG-compliant text color recommendations, helping you build cohesive design systems that scale beautifully.


Professional-Grade Control

  1. Precisely adjust colors using the perceptually uniform OKLCH space, with familiar HEX, RGB, and HSL formats
  2. Create smooth, mathematically accurate gradients that maintain consistent luminance
  3. Generate context-aware color names that adapt to your design system
  4. Ensure accessibility with automatic contrast checking and text color suggestions
  5. Export palettes directly to your design tools and documentation
  6. Spark inspiration with curated random palettes based on color theory principles


Essential For

🎨 Design Systems – Build scalable, consistent color foundations

🎯 Brand Identity – Craft unique, expressive, and flexible palettes

📦 UI Components – Achieve seamless visual harmony across elements

📱 Digital Products – Create accessible, high-impact user experiences

💡 Creative Exploration – Discover new directions with intelligent randomness


Experience the next evolution in color tooling. Centra Colors blends mathematical precision with designer-first workflows to help you build smarter, scalable color systems in less time. Crafted for professionals and teams who value scientific accuracy without compromising creative flexibility.

accepted.name: Olawale Balo
accepted.description: 🧑‍💻 Product Designer | ⚙️ Design Engineer | 🧩 Creator of Centra | 🧱 Building at Boastack

plugins.tagline: Build color systems with balance and purpose.

plugins.name: slajdomat
plugins.description: Using this plugin, you can create in Figma a presentation where slides are changed by zooming in or out. Each slide is a frame, and the plugin is used to connect the slides to each other, and to export the presentation. The presentation is exported into a web page. To make the plugin work, you need to download a standalone program which will import the presentation from Figma, and create the appropriate web page. https://github.com/bojanczyk/slajdomat/
plugins.tagline: Make zooming slide presentations

84776.name: slajdomat
84776.description: Using this plugin, you can create in Figma a presentation where slides are changed by zooming in or out. Each slide is a frame, and the plugin is used to connect the slides to each other, and to export the presentation. The presentation is exported into a web page. To make the plugin work, you need to download a standalone program which will import the presentation from Figma, and create the appropriate web page. https://github.com/bojanczyk/slajdomat/

plugins.name: Clean Gradients
plugins.description:
Problem:

When using a standard gradient with two colors, if there is a large gap between their tones, the saturation in the middle decreases significantly, and the color in this area may appear grayish-resulting in a «muddy» shade.


Solution:

With just two clicks, the plugin eliminates the «muddy» effect in the middle of the gradient by adding three additional intermediate color stops.


How to use the plugin:

1. The colors for the initial gradient can be taken either from an existing gradient element by selecting it and clicking the «Pick gradient» button or by using the «Color Picker» tool on the left and right of the button.

2. To apply the gradient, select the desired element and click the «Apply gradient» button.
plugins.tagline: Cleans the gradient from «dirt»

121505.description:

1. The colors for the initial gradient can be taken either from an existing gradient element by selecting it and clicking the «Pick gradient» button or by using the «Color Picker» tool on the left and right of the button.

2. To apply the gradient, select the desired element and click the «Apply gradient» button.

plugins.name: UA Generator by UI Architect
plugins.description:
UA Generator — це простий спосіб замінювати текстові шари у Figma реальними українськими іменами.

•Обирайте чоловічі, жіночі або змішані дані зі 100 різних імен, 100 прізвищ та 100 по-батькові.

•Увімкніть або вимкніть потрібні частини (Ім’я, Прізвище, По Батькові) й отримайте повноцінне ФІО.

•За бажанням плагін автоматично закриється після генерації.


Ідеально підходить для швидкого наповнення макетів чи прототипів локалізованим контентом на українській мові!
plugins.tagline: Генератор українських данних — це простий спосіб замінювати текстові шари у реальними данними

plugins.name: Layer Name Modifier
plugins.description:
The Layer Name Modifier plugin makes it much easier to organize and manage your layer names in Figma, helping you keep your projects more organized and consistent. With this plugin, you can perform the following actions:


  1. Add a Text to Layer Names: Easily append a word of your choice to the end of layer names.
  2. Remove a Text from Layer Names: Quickly remove any unwanted word from the layer names.
  3. Remove a Text from Only the Last Words of Layer Names: Use this feature to remove a specific word only from the last words of the layer names.

This plugin is a perfect tool for organizing and standardizing layer names, especially in large projects. Save time and make your workflow more efficient!


HOW TO USE THIS PLUGIN?

Add text to layer name

  1. Select the layers you want to add t text o the layer names.
  2. Run the plugin.
  3. Enter the text you want to add to the layer names into the input.
  4. When you click the Add Text button, the text you entered is added to the layer name.


Remove text from layer name

  1. Select the layers you want to remove texts from the layer names.
  2. Run the plugin.
  3. Select the "Remove text" checkbox.
  4. Enter the text you want to remove from the layer names into the input.
  5. When you click the "Remove text" button, the relevant word in the selected layers is removed.
  6. If you only want to process the last words of the layer name, check the relevant checkbox.
  7. When you click the Remove Text button, the text you entered into the input is deleted if it is the last word of the layer name.
plugins.tagline: Layer Name Modifier helps organize and manage layer names in Figma, keeping projects consistent.

113351.name: Layer Name Modifier
113351.description:

plugins.name: HypoGen: Simplify Hypothesis Creation in Figma
plugins.description:
HypoGen is a Figma plugin designed to streamline hypothesis generation, making it easy for designers and product teams to turn ideas into clear, testable statements. With simple prompts, HypoGen guides users to articulate their goals, assumptions, and expected outcomes, helping teams create well-structured hypotheses for design experiments and product improvements.


What You’ll Find:

•Guided Input Fields: Fill in prompts that help you clarify the problem, proposed solution, and expected impact.

•Instant Hypothesis Notes: Generate neatly formatted hypotheses directly on your Figma canvas, keeping ideas accessible and organized within your design environment.

•Consistent Structure: Follow a standardized hypothesis framework, ensuring your team’s testing approach is clear, goal-oriented, and easy to measure.


What You’ll Learn:

•How to Define Clear Hypotheses: Learn to break down design ideas into structured hypotheses that are actionable and focused on measurable results.

•Hypothesis-Driven Design Thinking: Incorporate hypothesis-based thinking into your design process, empowering you to test assumptions and make data-informed decisions with confidence.

•Effective Experimentation Practices: Develop hypotheses that drive meaningful experiments, improving your product iteratively with a user-centered approach.


Make your design decisions testable with HypoGen—create hypotheses effortlessly and start building with purpose.

accepted.name: ASSIST Software
accepted.description:
Design work that converts. 
From idea to market 🚀
Design team @ ASSIST Software

plugins.tagline: Hypothesis Creation Made Simple, Right Inside Figma.

plugins.name: Frame X-Ray Checker
plugins.description:
"Frame X-Ray Checker" is a handy plugin for creating presentation documents in Figma. By duplicating selected frames, lowering their opacity, and overlaying them, you can easily spot misalignments in text and layout.


「Frame X-Ray Checker」は、Figmaでプレゼンテーション文書を作成する際の便利なプラグインです。選択したフレームを複製し、不透明度を下げ、重ね合わせることで、テキストやレイアウトのずれを簡単に確認できます。
plugins.tagline: Spot misalignments in your documents at a glance

plugins.name: StyleSnap - Create AI Icons in Any Style
plugins.description:
Effortlessly create custom icons in any style with StyleSnap – the smart Figma plugin that brings AI-powered icon generation right where you work.


Whether you're designing a sleek UI or crafting a detailed illustration, StyleSnap lets you instantly replicate any icon style and generate new icons in seconds – all royalty-free and within Figma.


Perfect for designers who love consistency, speed, and creativity.


🎯 Right-Click Style Capture: Instantly capture the style of any icon in your Figma file with a simple right-click.


🖌️ AI-Powered Icon Generation: Describe the icon you want, and StyleSnap will create it to match the style you selected – from minimal to highly illustrative.


♾️ Style Agnostic: Works with any style – flat, outlined, detailed, 3D-inspired, or even hand-drawn.


🎨 Perfect for UI & Illustrations: Whether you're building out a clean interface or adding a creative touch, StyleSnap generates icons that feel perfectly on-brand.


🔓 Royalty-Free Icons: All generated icons are yours to use freely, with no licensing worries.


⚡ No Asset Library Needed: Skip the endless searches. Just pick a style, describe your icon, and go.


👨‍🎨 Great for Teams & Solo Designers: Maintain design consistency across projects without extra effort or asset juggling.


How to use the plugin?

  1. Install StyleSnap from the Figma Community.
  2. Right-click on any icon.
  3. Describe the new icon you need.
  4. Let the plugin generate it for you – in the exact style, ready to use and royalty-free.
plugins.tagline: Easily copy any icon style to create new icons in a snap

plugins.name: Slice Creator
plugins.description:
✂️ Slice Creator Plugin -- USE FOR EMAILS (KLAVIYO)

Easily split any selected element into even horizontal slices! Perfect for layouts, grids, or exporting assets. 🎉


How to Use 🚀

  1. Select a single element on your Figma canvas.
  2. Enter the number of slices in the plugin.
  3. Hit Create Slices to generate slices instantly!

Features ✨

  1. Quick, precise horizontal slicing.
  2. Auto-selects and zooms into the slices.
  3. Simple and seamless integration.

Limitations ⚠️

  1. Works with one element at a time.
  2. Only creates horizontal slices.

🎯 Perfect for efficient, consistent slicing!
plugins.tagline: Figma Plugin enables users to create evenly sliced sections of a selected element on the canvas.

113972.name: Slice Creator
113972.description:
✂️ Slice Creator Plugin -- USE FOR EMAILS (KLAVIYO)

Easily split any selected element into even horizontal slices! Perfect for layouts, grids, or exporting assets. 🎉


How to Use 🚀

  1. Select a single element on your Figma canvas.
  2. Enter the number of slices in the plugin.
  3. Hit Create Slices to generate slices instantly!

Features ✨

  1. Quick, precise horizontal slicing.
  2. Auto-selects and zooms into the slices.
  3. Simple and seamless integration.

Limitations ⚠️

  1. Works with one element at a time.
  2. Only creates horizontal slices.

🎯 Perfect for efficient, consistent slicing!
113972.release_notes: Can slice anything - Slices, Frames, ANYTHING
113972.tagline: Figma Plugin enables users to create evenly sliced sections of a selected element on the canvas.

plugins.name: Cloudinary Image Uploader
plugins.description:
Upload Images from Figma to Cloudinary

This tool allows you to upload images directly from Figma to Cloudinary, streamlining your workflow by eliminating the need to manually download and re-upload files.


How It Works

Cloudinary Account Setup

  1. Ensure you have an active Cloudinary account.
  2. Obtain your Cloud Name from the Cloudinary dashboard.
  3. Configure Unsigned Upload Preset:


Configure Unsigned Upload Preset:

  1. Go to your Cloudinary dashboard.
  2. Navigate to Settings > Upload.
  3. Create an unsigned upload preset and configure the desired settings (e.g., formats, transformations).
  4. Make sure to set the preset as unsigned to allow direct uploads without authentication.


Upload from Figma

  1. Use a Figma plugin or script that allows exporting images to Cloudinary.
  2. Enter your Cloud Name and unsigned preset name in the plugin/script settings.
  3. Select the images in Figma and click Upload.
plugins.tagline: Upload images directly from Figma to Cloudinary

101561.tagline: Upload images directly from Figma to Cloudinary

plugins.name: Gene UI Tokens Hub
plugins.description:
Gene UI Tokens Hub

Streamline your design-to-development workflow with Gene UI Tokens Hub, a Figma plugin that connects your design system tokens to your GitHub repository.


Key Features

  1. Sync Figma variables and explore them using JSON tree and variable collections filters
  2. Connect to GitHub and push changes to your style dictionary package
  3. Generate CSS3 and JavaScript variables from your design tokens


Benefits

  1. Automate the process of converting tokens into code
  2. Ensure consistency across your design system, design, and development teams
  3. Save time and reduce errors during the sync process of tokens


How it Works

  1. Install the Gene UI Tokens Hub plugin in your Figma account
  2. Make changes in Figma built-in variables and use it in your design styles
  3. Open the Gene UI Tokens Hub, and connect your GitHub repository to the plugin
  4. Review your changes and push them to your GitHub repository, where your style dictionary package will be generated
plugins.tagline: The Gene UI design system tokens hub plugin to keep aligned tokens between design and development

plugins.name: Palet
plugins.description:
The Palet Figma plugin allows you to generate color palettes, having feature parity with its web-counterpart. The plugin also maintains sync with the web version.


The plugin also allows for the creation of the palette as a swatch in the current file also.

plugins.name: Back to square zero™
plugins.description:
This plugin will group all content on the current page, set the position to be x=0 and y=0, and then ungroup your content again.


When another user opens the page for the first time, the content will always be within the default Figma zoom area!


Run this plugin on each page...


Video demo → https://youtu.be/_RmKBVBIpW4?si=i4tlU7SOZ26aUIFp


If you like this plugin, consider sharing on the socials or buying me an oat-milk latte → https://www.buymeacoffee.com/menosketiago

accepted.name: Tiago Almeida
accepted.description: Design Systems at Volvo Cars — Ex-Klarna/Mentimeter — DesignOps and Leadership

plugins.tagline: Places all your content inside the default canvas zoom area (when a page opens for the first time)

plugins.name: Smart Shadow Pro
plugins.description:
Smart Shadow Pro is your advanced tool for creating clean, consistent, and visually stunning shadows in Figma. Designed for designers who care about precision and elegance, this plugin gives you full control over shadow behavior with real-time visual feedback.


🎯 Adjust blur, spread, opacity, offset and color effortlessly

🎯 Drag to reposition shadow direction with smooth UX

🎯 Choose from professionally-tuned presets: Soft, Medium, and Hard

🎯 See everything in a beautiful live preview panel

🎯 Works instantly on selected layers — never overwrites unless you want it


Whether you're designing soft cards or strong elevation systems, Smart Shadow Pro helps you maintain pixel-perfect depth across your design system.


Built with developers in mind. Loved by UI pros.
plugins.tagline: Control shadows like a pro.

127641.name: Smart Shadow Pro
127641.description:
Smart Shadow Pro is your advanced tool for creating clean, consistent, and visually stunning shadows in Figma. Designed for designers who care about precision and elegance, this plugin gives you full control over shadow behavior with real-time visual feedback.

networkAccess.reasoning: Plugin does not make network requests. Fonts are loaded only by the UI iframe.

plugins.name: FillGPT
plugins.description:
FillGPT is an AI-powered Figma plugin designed to improve workflow efficiency by automating content generation, text optimization, and design analysis. It helps designers, copywriters, and product teams enhance UI copy, rename layers, and analyze design best practices.


Key features:


- Smart layer renaming to keep files organized

- AI-generated content for UI elements and marketing copy

- Copy enhancement, including expanding, shortening, and rephrasing text

- Tone and style adjustment to match different contexts

- Design analysis to improve clarity, accessibility, and readability

- Grammar and spelling error detection and correction

- Text summarization and expansion for better content flow


FillGPT streamlines the design process, ensuring high-quality text and a more efficient workflow within Figma.
plugins.tagline: Use ChatGPT and Gemini in figma

plugins.name: UniBold: Unicode Page Styler
plugins.description:
Transform your Figma workspace with sophisticated typography that stands out. UniBold converts standard text into elegant mathematical sans-serif bold characters, creating visual hierarchy and professional organization throughout your design files.


Why designers love UniBold:

  1. Create instant visual distinction between sections and components
  2. Maintain consistent typographic hierarchy across all projects
  3. Improve team navigation with clearly emphasized page names
  4. Enhance presentation-ready files with polished page organization


Getting started is simple:

  1. Select the page you want to restyle
  2. Choose the style that works best for you: Uppercase, Lowercase, or preserve your original formatting
  3. Apply the new bold Unicode style to your page name with a single click


Elevate your file organization from functional to exceptional. UniBold transforms the mundane task of page naming into an opportunity for refined design thinking—because even the smallest details deserve attention.

accepted.name: Petr "Stoky" Novak
accepted.description: My passions are product design, UI, and design systems...all at Emplifi

plugins.tagline: Bold your pages. Structure your designs. Simplify your workflow.

plugins.name: AutoLayers
plugins.description:
AutoLayers is a powerful Figma plugin designed to simplify your design workflow by automatically renaming layers based on their type and frame layout mode. Whether you’re working with rectangles, text, or complex auto-layout frames, AutoLayers ensures your layers are consistently named and organized.


With support for multiple selected frames, this plugin helps you keep your Figma files tidy and easy to navigate, saving you time and effort on manual renaming.


AutoLayers ver1.0.2 by Kemonn98

Last Updated: September 9. 2024

muhsalmon.com
plugins.tagline: Streamline Your Design Workflow with AutoLayers
